name: Shard Cavern
description:
You, the mightiest Yeti from Maple Story, have challenged the Shard Cavern...  Escape incoming shard storms and prove your worth...  How long can you withstand the Shard Cavern for?  That's for you to find out...

Shard Cavern is a single-player casual endless bullet-hell where you put your reaction time & reflexes to the test.  This is my first game alone from scratch and I have thoroughly enjoyed the development process.  I've learnt a lot from this small game and I hope you will enjoy it as much as I do!

CONTROLS

Simple controls anyone can master!

Movement:  A, D / Arrow Keys
Dash:  Space + Movement

FEEDBACK WELCOME

As this is an initial build of Shard Cavern, I'm going to need all the feedback I can get!  Please let me know if you find any bugs for me to squash / things that annoy you when playing the game!

CONTACT / FOLLOW ME

Follow me on Instagram @tsucchi.dev to join me on my game development journey with regular dev-log posts and making art for games!  A DM on instagram would be the easiest way to reach me.  You may also contact me at tsucchi.dev@gmail.com.
